choices: Refuse to go to the camp.
1.content:
"I'm sorry Stephen" Mrs Collins says, looking at your attempt at sewing. "I just can't pass you."

"But I get straight 'A's" you complain.

"Not in Home Economics" she says. "I don't think you've taken this class seriously."

"I..." you start to argue but she's right. You took this class because you thought it would be easy and would let you focus on your other subjects. Unfortunately you discovered that your talent in chemistry didn't translate to the kitchen. "Does this mean I have to repeat."

"Not necessarily." she says with a smile. "I might have a way for you to earn some extra credit."

"What?" you ask nervously.

"I also have a Child Care class." she starts. "And every year I take the girls on a camp. The girls who get the lowest marks volunteer to be babies so that the others can practice taking care of them full time."

You don't like where this is going. "What does this have to do with me?"

"I'm one volunteer short this year." She says. "If you come to the camp as one of the babies I'll give you enough extra credit to pass Home Economics."
1.title: Volunteer

choices: Ask Louise why she's so happy.
11.content:
"Okay" you reluctantly agree. "I can't afford to fail."

"Good." She smiles at you. "We are meeting at the Child Care room Friday morning. Don't worry about packing anything. I'll bring everything you need."

Friday morning arrives too soon. When you arrive at the Child Care room there are already three few girls waiting. Helen, Tanya and Jane. They all have suitcases with them so you deduce that they must not be volunteers.

"The first baby is here." Helen announces.

The other giggle. They must have been informed that you were joining the camp.

"Don't worry." Tanya tells you. "I'll be your mommy."

"Hi Girls." someone greets the other from the doorway behind you. "Hi Daniel."

You turn and are dismayed to see Kate, also carrying a suitcase. If you had known she was in the Child Care class you probably would have chosen to repeat Home Economics instead of volunteering for this camp. You've had a crush on her since the start of high-school and now she's going to see you playing baby.

"Hi Kate." you reply, failing to hide your unhappiness.

"Cheer up." She tells you. "It's not going to be that bad. You might even have fun."

You offer her a weak smile.

The rest of the girls, along with Mrs Collins, arrive soon after. There are 12 girls with suitcases and 5 without. The girls without suitcases seem almost as unhappy about being here as you. All except for one. Louise seems to be barely able to hide her excitement.
11.title: Take the deal.

111.content:
"Why are you so happy?" you ask Louise. "We're going to be treated like babies."

"I know." she says. "It's going to be fun."

"You want to act like a baby?" you ask her. "Don't you think it'll be embarrassing"

"No I play house with Ellen and Felicity all the time." she says.

"She's our baby." Felicity hugs Louise from behind. "Aren't you?"

"Yep." Louise says happily. "And now we can play for real."

"What do you mean 'for real'?" you ask.

"Mrs Collins didn't explain what happens on this camp?" Ellen asks you.

"Just that we act like babies so the rest of you can practice taking care of us." you say.

"So she didn't tell you that you'll be wearing diapers?" Ellen asks.

"Wearing diapers?" you ask.

"And using them." Felicity adds.

"What?" you are shocked.

"Changing diapers is a big part of taking care of babies." Felicity explains.

"I can't go through with this." you say. "It's too embarrassing."

"No. You'll have fun." Louise insists. "Jessica and Fiona are going to stay in the same house as us. Be their baby and we'll make sure you have fun."

"I don't think..." you start but Felicity cuts you off.

"Jessica." she calls her friend over. "Stephen wants to be your baby for the camp. Is that okay with you?"

Jessica smiles. "Of course it is." She gets Fiona. "Stephen wants to be our baby."

"Cool." Fiona agrees.

Soon Mrs Collins starts to get everyone organised. "Now everyone's here you can sort yourselves into families." She says. "Sarah, Judy, Louise, Samantha, Danielle and Stephen are going to be the babies. Everyone else organise yourselves into pairs."

Ellen and Felicity team up quickly, as do Jessica and Fiona. The remaining girls pair up. Kate with Tanya, Helen with Jane, Rachel with Kelly and Ashleigh with Deborah.

"Good." Mrs Collins says. "Now the babies can choose their parents."

Louise rushes over to Ellen and Felicity and Fiona waves you over. "Come on Stephen."

You walk, with the group, out of the class room. The other "volunteers" are dressed in equally juvenile outfits. Louise skips along happily, as if she was actually a little girl. The rest of you look nervously around afraid that someone might see you.

On board, you find another surprise waiting for you. The bus has been fitted with 6 giant baby-seats. Miss Collins is, apparently, very thorough.

She just sticks her tongue out at you and laughs.

Turning away from her, you stare out the window. How did you get yourself into this.

As the drive continues you begin to feel pressure growing on your bladder.
1111212.title: Tell her she's weird

choices: Refuse to be changed while everyone is watching
11112121.content:
You're going to have to use your diaper eventually. You might as well do it now rather than fight an impossible battle to hold on.

You relax and allow a trickle to escape into your diaper. It is quickly absorbed so you release a little more and finally empty your bladder.

The padding between your legs and against your bottom swells as it absorbs the liquid, making it much less comfortable.

"Stephen went pee pee." Louise announces loudly.

You look down and see that the crotch of your diaper has grown darker and slightly yellow.

When you look up again, Fiona is looking at you. "Looks like someone needs a diaper change." then she calls out to Mrs Collins. "Are we going so stop somewhere soon? Stephen needs to be changed."

This draws a few giggles from the other girls.

Mrs Collins has a quick word with the driver then replies. "There's a rest stop coming up. We will pull over there."

As promised, the bus pulls over at a rest stop about 15 minutes later. "Check your babies' diapers." Mrs Collins directs the girls. "This is the only chance you'll get to change them before we arrive at the camp."

You watch as they lift their babies' skirts and inspect their diapers. It turns out that Louise is the only other person who needs a change.

Fiona unclips you from your baby seat and helps you up. Felicity does the same for Louise. Jessica and Ellen bring the diaper bags as you are led off the bus to a patch of grass.

Jessica and Ellen unpack the changing mats and spread them on the grass. "lay down." Fiona directs you and Louise.

You can see all of the other students watching through the windows of the bus as Louise lays on her mat and Felicity begins changing her.
11112121.title: Use the diaper

choices: Admit that you do need to pee
11112122.content:
You know that you are going to have to use your diaper eventually but you're not ready to add to your humiliation just yet.

Soon you are forced to wriggle about in your seat to hold on.

"Do you need to pee?" Louise notices your discomfort.
11112122.title: Hold on

111122.content:
"I can't go outside like this." you complain. "Everyone will see me in a diaper."

"Hurry up Fiona and Jessica." Mrs Collins tells them when everyone else has left the room.

"Stephen won't move." Jessica explains.

"Well his behavior is your responsibility." Mrs Collins says. "It's up to you to discipline him."

"You heard her." Fiona tells you. "Get to the bus of you get a spanking."

"No." you say, realising that you must sound like a disobedient child.

Jessica gives you a hard whack on the seat of your diaper. Even through the padding it hurts a little.

"Ow!" you complain, covering your bottom with your hands.

"I warned you." she says sternly. "Now go to the bus."

When you don't move Jessica takes hold of your hands and pulls them away from your bottom, Fiona then pulls down the waist of your diaper and begins smacking your bare bottom.

Before long you are crying. "Please stop."

"Are you going to be a good baby?" Jessica asks.

"Yes." you sob.

Fiona pulls your diaper back up into place before pulling you into a hug. "It's okay Stephen. Aunty Fiona still loves you but you need to do what you are told."

The girls lead you outside, still crying a little from the pain and embarrassment of your spanking. Fortunately everyone else is in class and it is a short walk to the bus.

On board you find that the bus has been fitted with 6 over-sized baby seats. 5 are already occupied by the other babies. Louise waves to you from her seat. "We saved you the one next to me."

Fiona and Jessica lead you to the seat and clip you in.

"What's wrong?" Louise asks, noticing that you've clearly been crying.

"Stephen had a spanking because he wouldn't come out to the bus." Jessica explains. "But he's going to be a good baby now."

With everyone on board, the driver starts the bus and pulls out of the school.

Louise chats away happily. You answer any questions but don't really contribute much to the conversation. As the drive continues you begin to feel pressure growing on your bladder.
111122.title: Refuse to go outside like this

choices: Say that you don't want to be changed in front of everyone
1111221.content:
You're going to have to use your diaper eventually and you don't want to risk another spanking for being uncooperative.

You relax and allow a trickle to escape into your diaper. It is quickly absorbed so you release a little more and finally empty your bladder.

The padding between your legs and against your bottom swells as it absorbs the liquid, making it much less comfortable.

"Stephen went pee pee." Louise announces loudly.

You look down and see that the crotch of your diaper has grown darker and slightly yellow.

When you look up again, Fiona is looking at you. "Looks like someone needs a diaper change." then she calls out to Mrs Collins. "Are we going so stop somewhere soon? Stephen needs to be changed."

This draws a few giggles from the other girls.

Mrs Collins has a quick word with the driver then replies. "There's a rest stop coming up. We will pull over there."

As promised, the bus pulls over at a rest stop about 15 minutes later. "Check your babies' diapers." Mrs Collins directs the girls. "This is the only chance you'll get to change them before we arrive at the camp."

You watch as they lift their babies' skirts and inspect their diapers. It turns out that Louise is the only other person who needs a change.

Fiona unclips you from your baby seat and helps you up. Felicity does the same for Louise. Jessica and Ellen bring the diaper bags as you are led off the bus to a patch of grass.

Jessica and Ellen unpack the changing mats and spread them on the grass. "lay down." Fiona directs you and Louise.

You can see all of the other students watching through the windows of the bus as Louise lays on her mat and Felicity begins changing her.
1111221.title: Use the diaper

11112211.content:
You don't want to be changed in front of the whole class but the alternative is likely to be another spanking so you lay down on the mat.

Jessica untapes your diaper and pulls it open. You feel cold air on your wet privates. Next she cleans you with a couple of baby-wipes before rolling up the soggy diaper to be disposed of. She quickly replaces it with a dry one and tapes you into it. "All done." she declares, helping you up off the ground.

Felicity is also helping Louise up off her mat. "Thank you Aunty Felicity." Louise hugs Felicity, who giggles and returns the hug.

Everything is packed up you you return to the bus where you and Louise are clipped into your baby seats again and the trip continues.

The bus arrives at the camp a little over an hour later. Jessica unclips you from your baby-seat and you follow the group off the bus.

"You should all get to your rooms and check your babies' diapers." Mrs Collins tells the girls. "Then get settled in. We'll meet at 12 for lunch."

Louise takes Ellen's hand in her left and Felicity's in her right and they start off toward the dorm. "Come on Stephanie." Fiona says, taking your hand. "Let's go see the dorm."

You follow the girls into your dorm. Inside, you find four beds, two giant cots and one large changing table.

"Do you need another diaper change?" Jessica asks, patting the crotch of your diaper. "Nope, still dry."

Felicity lifts Louise's skit and finds that she is also dry.

"I think we should go explore the camp" Jessica suggests.

"Maybe we should put the babies down for a nap." Felicity says.

"I don't wanna take a nap." Louise says crossing her arms. "I wanna play?"

"What about you Stephen." Fiona asks. "Do you want to take a nap or come with us?"
11112211.title: Lay down

11112212.content:
"But everyone is watching." you say

"Babies don't care who sees them have their diapers changed." Jessica informs you.

"Well I do." you say.

Fiona gives you a hard slap on the seat of your diaper. It is loud but your bottom is protected by the thick padding. "Lay down." she orders you in a maternal tone.
11112212.title: Say that you don't want to be changed in fr...

1111222.content:
You know that you won't be able to avoid using your diaper for the entire camp but you want to postpone it as long as possible.

As the pressure builds you find yourself fidgeting uncomfortable in your seat.

"Do you need to pee?" Louse asks.

"Yes." you admit.

"Use your diaper." she says. "It's not so bad."

"You've tried it?" you ask.

She nods and lifts up the skirt of her dress. A dark yellow stain is obvious at the crotch of her diaper.
1111222.title: Hold on

11112221.content:
"Eww." you say.

Louise only giggles in response. "You'll have to do it too, soon."

You hold on anyway.

You are almost ready to burst by the time the bus arrives at the camp. Jessica unclips you from your baby-seat and you follow the group off the bus.

Being able to walk makes the pressure a little more manageable but even then you don't make it far before your bladder finally gives up. You stop walking as it happens. This is enough to get all the girls' attention and they watch as your diaper grows thicker and darker and begins to sag from the increased weight.

"Looks like someone needs a change." Rachel comments, provoking giggles from the others.

"You should all get to your rooms and check your babies' diapers." Mrs Collins tells the girls. "Then get settled in. We'll meet at 12 for lunch."

Louise takes Ellen's hand in her left and Felicity's in her right and they start off toward the dorm. "Come on Stephen." Fiona says, taking your hand. "Let's get you changed into a nice dry diaper."

You follow the girls into your dorm. Inside, you find four beds, two giant cots and one large changing table.

"It looks like you need a change too." Felicity comments, lifting Louise's skirt to check. "Who wants to go first?"

"Daniel can get his diaper changed first." Louise offers. "I don't mind."
11112221.title: Keep holding on

11112222.content:
"Fine." you accept your fate and cautiously release a trickle. However, relaxing your bladder slightly causes you to lose control completely and you quickly flood the diaper. The pee flows down between your legs and pools around your bottom before it begins to be absorbed by the padding.

"You really had to go." Louise comments, looking at your heavy diaper. "See I told you it's not so bad."

You shift uncomfortably in your seat. The diaper has grown thicker and feels warm and damp. "It doesn't feel very comfortable." you complain.

"What's wrong?" Fiona turns around, overhearing your conversation with Louise. "Oh you've wet your diaper."

You blush. Then blush more deeply as she calls out across the buss "Mrs Collins. Stephen needs a diaper change. Could we stop somewhere please?"

Mrs Collins has a quick word with the driver before responding. "We're less than an hour away from the camp. Stephen can wait until you get to your dorm."

So you are forced to sit in your soggy diaper until you finally arrive at the camp. Jessica unclips you from your baby-seat and you follow the group off the bus.

"You should all get to your rooms and check your babies' diapers." Mrs Collins tells the girls. "Then get settled in. We'll meet at 12 for lunch."

Louise takes Ellen's hand in her left and Felicity's in her right and they start off toward the dorm. "Come on Stephen." Fiona says, taking your hand. "Let's go change your diaper."

You follow the girls into your dorm. Inside, you find four beds, two giant cots and one large changing table.

"Do you need a diaper change too?" Felicity asks, lifting Louise's skirt to check for herself. "Yep. You're soaked too."

"Who wants to go first?" Ellen asks.

"Stephen can get his diaper changed first." Louise offers. "I don't mind."
11112222.title: Wet your diaper

1112.content:
There's no way you're going to wear, and worse use, diapers. You turn and run out of the Child Care room.

"Wait." Louise calls as you get through the door. "Where are you going?"

Honestly, you don't know but you keep running.
1112.title: Run away

11121.content: You don't want to get into trouble for leaving the school grounds but where will you go. You'd normally have Science this period but your teacher isn't expecting you to be there.
11121.title: Stay in the school

choices: Ask for permission to go to the toilet
111211.content:
You walk into your science classroom.

"Stephen." Mr King pauses in the middle of a demonstration. "You're late."

"Sorry sir." you say, taking your seat next to Daniel.

As the lesson continues you notice some of the girls from the Child Care class wandering around outside the window. They are looking for you.
111211.title: Go to Science anyway

1112111.content:
You turn your face away from the window and hope that the girls don't see you. Eventually they move on the look somewhere else.

A few minutes later Mrs Collins comes into the room. "I'm sorry to interrupt Mr King." she says. "But Stephen isn't meant to be in class today. He volunteered to help out on my camp."

"Stephen." Mr King waves you out. "You'd better get going then."

"What camp?" Daniel whispers to you confused.
1112111.title: Stay where you are

11121111.content:
If you don't cooperate you risk the other students finding out what you volunteered for.

Without a word, you follow Mrs Collins out of the room. You'll have to think of some explanation for Daniel but you've got until Tuesday.

Back in the Child Care room you find that the other "babies" are already dressed in juvenile outfits. Jessica and Fiona are waiting next to a changing mat.

"You'd better get him ready quickly." Mrs Collins directs them. "Everyone's waiting."

Jessica undresses you and lays you on the mat. Fiona unfolds a large disposable diaper and slides it under your bottom before taping you into it.

"There, it's not so bad is it?" Fiona asks, helping you up off the mat.

"Try it." you say.

Jessica and Fiona both laugh at this as Jessica picks up a short pink dress with a pleated skirt, identical to the one Louise is already wearing. "Arms up."

"A dress?" you ask.

"There aren't any baby boy's clothes." Fiona explains. "Anyway, you don't want to be the only boy. You'd have nobody to play with."

You sigh, defeated, and raise your arms, allowing Jessica to pull the dress on over your head. "You look so cute."

You respond with a glare but she ignores it.

She then finds you a pair of shoes, also identical to Louise's, and helps you into them.

Mrs Collins then announces. "Okay it looks like everyone is finally ready. Let's get on the bus."

You walk, with the group, out of the class room. The other "volunteers" are dressed in equally juvenile outfits. Louise skips along happily, as if she was actually a little girl. The rest of you look nervously around afraid that someone might see you.

On board, you find another surprise waiting for you. The bus has been fitted with 6 giant baby-seats. Miss Collins is, apparently, very thorough.

"Strap your babies into their seats." She directs.

Fiona and Jessica seat you in the one next to Louise and clip you in before taking their own seats in front of you.

The driver starts the bus and pulls out onto the road.

"Okay time to go over the rules." Mrs Collins says. standing at the front of the bus. "First, until we get back, the toilet is strictly off-limits for the babies. You will use your diapers.Second, babies may not dress themselves or change their own diapers, they must depend on their parents for that. And third, parents are responsible for the behavior of their babies. If they do something wrong it is up to you to punish them."

Louise chats away happily, you respond to questions but don't really get involved in the conversation.

It isn't long into the drive when you begin to feel the need to pee.

"No." you say. "I changed my mind. I'm not going on the camp."

This draws a lot of confused looks from the other students as you turn a deep red.

"What is she talking about?" Daniel whispers.

"Are you coming?" Mrs Collins asks with a look that says she might reveal more about the camp if you refuse.

"There you are." she says, coming into the room. Everyone turns to look at her. She is dressed like a giant toddler in a short pink dress and matching shoes. "Why did you run away? We're all waiting for you to get ready so we can leave for the camp."

"I don't care who knows." She says skipping along, her short pleated skirt flapping up, occasionally revealing glimpses of the seat of her diaper. "I like being a baby."

Back in the Child Care room you find that the other "babies" are already dressed in juvenile outfits. Jessica and Fiona are waiting next to a changing mat.

"You'd better get him ready quickly." Mrs Collins directs them. "Everyone's waiting."

Jessica undresses you and lays you on the mat. Fiona unfolds a large disposable diaper and slides it under your bottom before taping you into it.

"There, it's not so bad is it?" Fiona asks, helping you up off the mat.

"Try it." you say.

Jessica and Fiona both laugh at this as Jessica picks up a short pink dress with a pleated skirt, identical to the one Louise is already wearing. "Arms up."

"A dress?" you ask.

You sigh, defeated, and raise your arms, allowing Jessica to pull the dress on over your head.

Fiona then finds you a pair of shoes, also identical to Louise's, and helps you into them.

You walk, with the group, out of the class room. The other "volunteers" are dressed in equally juvenile outfits. Louise skips along happily.

"Go back and tell Mrs Collins to go without me." you tell her. "I'm not going."

"Mrs Collins' Child Care camp." Louise explains happily. "Some of us pretend to be babies so that the other girls can practice taking care of us."

"Really?" Daniel asks you. "Why?"

If you went to Science it would be too easy for Mrs Collins to find you. You need to hide until she she gives up and leaves for camp without you.

You could hide in the boys' toilets. The girls won't be able to come in and find you. There's also a spot behind the gym which is out of sight. You know that some kids hide there and smoke at lunch time.

You notice the Louise is not amongst them. She must be looking for you with some of the other girls.

You run to the spot behind the gym and wait there.

You've barely caught your breath when Jessica and Fiona come around the corner and find you.

"There you are." Jessica says. "Why did you run away?"

"I don't want to wear diapers." you say.

"It won't be that bad." Fiona insists.

"Easy for you to say." you argue. "You won't be the one wetting themself all weekend."

"There are 5 others who will be wearing diapers." Jessica responds. "Just try to enjoy it, like Louise."

"Louise is weird." you reply. "She wants to wear diapers."

"You might like it too." Fiona suggests. "Being taken care of completely, you won't even have to worry about going to the toilet."

"If you think it sounds so good why don't you try it." You say.

"Would you rather come as a parent?" she asks. "And change poopy diapers?"
1112122.title: Hide behind the gym

11121221.content:
"Yes." you say. "It's better than wearing them."

"Okay then." Fiona says. "I'll be the baby."

The girls lead you back to the Child Care room and explains your agreement to Mrs Collins.

"That's fine with me." Mrs Collins says. "So long as I still have six babies."

"And you'll let me pass Home Economics." you ask, to clarify.

"I will mark you on how well you take care of Fiona. If you do a good job then you'll get enough extra marks to pass." she says. "Now hurry up and get her into a diaper. Everyone else is waiting." She hands you a large bag. "You'll find everything you need in here."

You take the bag to an empty space on the floor and unzip it.

"Take out the changing mat." Jessica directs you, as she starts to undress Fiona. "And spread it out on the floor."

You find the large padded plastic mat and unfold it onto the carpet. You also take out a large disposable diaper and examine it. before laying it on the floor next to the mat.

When Fiona is completely naked she lays down on the mat, blushing a little.

"Now unfold the diaper and slide it under her bottom." Jessica says, watching as you do so. "Now pull the front up between her legs. Make sure it's snug or the diaper will leak. And then fasten the tapes."

You do as you are told and then help Fiona up. Jessica finds her a cute dress and pulls it on over her head. Then slides her feet into matching shoes.

Mrs Collins announces. "Okay it looks like everyone is finally ready. Let's get on the bus."

You and Jessica lead Fiona out of the class room with the group. The "volunteers" are all dressed in juvenile outfits. Louise skips along happily, as if she was actually a little girl. The rest of them look nervously around afraid that someone might see them.

On board, you find that the bus has been fitted with 6 giant baby-seats. Miss Collins is, apparently, very thorough.

"Strap your babies into their seats." She directs.

You clip Fiona into the one next to Louise before taking you own seats in front of her.

The driver starts the bus and pulls out onto the road.

"Okay time to go over the rules." Mrs Collins says. standing at the front of the bus. "First, until we get back, the toilet is strictly off-limits for the babies. You will use your diapers. Second, babies may not dress themselves or change their own diapers, they must depend on their parents for that. And third, parents are responsible for the behavior of their babies. If they do something wrong it is up to you to punish them."

About an hour into the drive you begin to think you smell pee.
11121221.title: Say yes

choices: Go back to the Child Care room with them
11121222.content:
"Ewww" you say, making a face. "No."

"Then come as a baby." Fiona says. "And let me wipe your bottom."

"We know that you'll fail Home Economics if you don't come." Jessica says. "I promise that we'll be nice and try not to embarrass you too much."
11121222.title: Say no

111212221.content:
You reluctantly go back with them to the Child Care Room and one you arrive you see Mrs. Collins standing there with both of her hands on her hips looking down at you glaring, "well now what do we have here, a bad little baby is what we have here." She says

"I'm not a baby." you mumble

"Fiona, Jessica leave to tend to the others I have to deal with him in my office."

"Okay Mrs. Collins." They both say and scurry out of the room.

"Follow me then Stephen, I have a plan for you that only my bad students get."

"No!" You shout.

"You have no choice, I already called your parents and told them what you did. They said I can do whatever I want with you."

"I don't believe you."

"Ohh no, well come with me and you'll see." Mrs. Collins says as she grabs Stephen by the hand and drags him into her office sitting him in one of her chairs.

"Now be a good baby and sit there calmly. Okay."

"For the last time I'm not a baby."

"Not now you're not, but after I'm done with you, you will be." She says taking a seat in her big office chair and begins digging in her desk for something. Meanwhile Stephen just sits there pouting and ignoring what she's doing.

Mrs. Collins has found what she was looking for an odd remote looking thing with a few buttons on it and a small screen. "There it is, so are you ready to be punished little baby Stephen?"

"Stop calling me......" Stephen says as he is interrupted by Mrs. Collins pressing a button on the remote shooting a beam of light out towards him engulfing him.

Mrs. Collins just watches Stephen while he feels his entire body tingle except is head. What ever Mrs. Collins has did to him Stephen continues to feel his body tingle and the odd feeling of some how getting smaller. After what seemed like 10 minutes went by the beam of light had stopped, the tingling went away and Stephen could see again, but could barely see Mrs. Collins, "what did you do to me?"

"Well, you see Stephen I used this remote I developed myself to make you fit your part more perfectly."

Looking down at himself in the chair instead of seeing his usual sight of his body below his neck. He sees a small short limb body covered in bright pink fabric one piece pajamas. At the ends of his much smaller and shorter arms he sees very tiny hands, "what the heck did you do to me, where's my body?"

"Listen Stephen, I changed your body into a tiny little baby girls body so you can fit your part better and to help you pass this class."

"But why? You just can't do that!"

"Well to bad, it's your punishment." Mrs. Collins says standing up from her chair heading for her door, "Fiona, Jessica come in my office please, Stephen now needs your help."

"Ohh goody." They both say walking into her office to see Stephen with his tiny little body under his head, "oh my god he looks so cute." Fiona

"So girls take care of him good, treat him like a baby at all times."

"We will." Jessica finally says

With that Fiona picks Stephen up cradling him like a baby carrying him out to where the other girls are. Everyone of them looks at him complimenting on how cute he looks. Meanwhile Stephen just looks angry at everyone of them.

What happens next?
111212221.title: Go back to the Child Care room with them

11122.content:
You just want to get away from here. Ignoring the likely consequences, you turn and run out of the school grounds. When you are out of sight of the school you stop and catch your breath.

What are you going to do now? Your mother will be at home and you aren't sure you could explain yourself when she asks why you're not on the camp.
11122.title: Leave the school

choices: Tell her that Mrs Collins didn't need your help anymore
Tell her that Mrs Collins expected you to wear diapers
111221.content:
The school will call your mother when your teachers realise that you've left. Maybe you should make sure she hears your version of events first.

You arrive home and let yourself in.

Your mother catches you on the way to your room. "What are you doing home? Shouldn't you be on your way to Mrs Collins' camp?"

"I'm not going to the camp." you say.

"Why not?" your mother asks. "I thought they needed you to help."
111221.title: Go home

1112211.content:
"Mrs Collins said she didn't need my help anymore." you lie. "Two of the girls were sick so they needed one less volunteer."

"Then why did you come home?" she asks. "Shouldn't you have gone to your normal classes?"

"I..." you hadn't thought that far ahead. "Um."

"I'm going to call the school and find out what's going on." she says.

You can't think of what to say to stop her as she goes to the telephone.
1112211.title: Tell her that Mrs Collins didn't need your ...

11122111.content:
Avoiding your mother now will only make things worse. You decide to wait and face the consequences.

She is on the phone for a long time. You feel stupid standing here in the hallway so you decide to wait in your room. You try to read a book but can't focus as the feeling of dread builds.

You jump when your mother finally calls "Stephen. Get in here now!"

You find her in the living room. "I spoke with Mrs Collins." she says. "She said that she didn't give you permission you leave. You ran away when you found out that you had to wear diapers on the camp. She also told me that the reason you volunteered was that you needed the extra credit to pass Home Economics. Is this true?"

"Yes." you say, staring at your feet.

"Because you didn't go on the camp." she continues. "Two of the girls don't have a baby to take care of and had to stay behind."

"But..." you start, not knowing hat to say but feeling that you need to defend yourself somehow.

"We have come to an arrangement though." she say. "You will be getting your extra credit by playing baby for the girls over the weekend. Diapers and everything."

"You're going to drive me to the camp?" you ask.

"No. I've invited the girls to stay here for the weekend." she says. "Although one of them, Fiona, suggested that you might stay with her family. She says that she has a 5-year-old cousin who stays with them sometimes and they keep the spare room set up for them."

Your parents often have other people visit on the weekend. You don't want to be seen in diapers by any of their friends. However you don't know who might see you at Fiona's house.
11122111.title: Stay and face the consequences

1112212.content:
"I found out that Mrs Collins wanted me to wear diapers on the camp." you pause for a moment, not sure you want to say the next bit. "And she expected me to use them."

"What?" you mother asks. "Why?"

"She wants her Child Care students to practice taking care of babies." you explain. "Changing diapers is part of that."

"Why did you agree to go on the camp before you knew what it was about?" she asks.
1112212.title: Tell her that Mrs Collins expected you to wear ...

11122121.content:
"I'm failing Home Economics." you inform her. "Mrs Collins said she would give me extra credit if I volunteered."

"You're failing?" your mother asks. "But you always get good marks."

"I'm no good at that stuff." you say. "I should have taken computing instead."

"Why didn't you tell me?" she asks. "I could have helped."

"I'm sorry Mom." you say. "I know I should have."

"I'll call the school and talk to Mrs Collins." she say. "I need to let her know where you are anyway and maybe we can figure something out."

You go to your room and wait while she does.

A few minutes later she lets herself into your room. "Mrs Collins is very disappointed that you ran away." She says. "It means that two of her girls will miss out on the camp."

"Who?" you ask.

"Jessica and Fiona" she informs you. "However, she is still prepared to let to earn that extra credit and pass Home Economics."

"How?" you ask, nervously.

"You don't have to go to the camp. They are leaving now anyway." she says. "But you'll still have to wear diapers."

"What?" you ask. "No."

"Just listen first." she insists. "Mrs Collins doesn't want Jessica and Fiona to miss out. She said that she will still let you pass if you play their baby for the weekend."

"At home?" you ask.

"Yes." she nods. "It'll just be you and the two girls."
11122121.title: Admit that you are failing Home Economics

11122122.content:
"I was just trying to be helpful." you lie. "Mrs Collins said she was one volunteer short and I just had to pretend to be a baby. I didn't know she was going to take it so far."

"Well I'd better call the school and tell Mrs Collins where you are." She says.

As she does you go to your room, hoping that Mrs Collins has already left and your mother can only leave a message for her.

Your hopes are dashed minutes later when your mother calls out. "Stephen. Get out here."

You find her in the living room.

"You're failing Home Economics?" she asks.

"I..." you stutter. "Um..."

"Were you going to wait until I got your report to tell me?" she asks.

"I thought I could get my marks up." you say. "I didn't want to worry you."

"Yes. You were going to get extra credit for going on Mrs Collins' camp." she says. "But now you're not going to get that are you?"

"No." you shake your head.

"Fortunately, Mrs Collins is giving you another chance because she doesn't want two of her girls to miss out on taking care of a baby."

"I'm not going to that camp." you insist. "There's no way I'm wearing diapers."

"You don't have to go to the camp." she says. "But you'll still have to wear diapers."

"What?" you ask. "No."

"I didn't give you a choice." she says. "The girls are already on their way here with the necessary supplies. You will spend the weekend as their baby."
11122122.title: Say that you were just trying to be helpful

When the movie finishes it is only midday. Still too early to go home. A glance in you wallet tells you that you have enough money for another movie or lunch but not both.

There is something concerning in her tone. You don't like this but make your way to the living room anyway.

When you arrive, you are surprised to find Jessica and Fiona waiting with your mother.

"Mrs Collins called." your mother begins. "She said you ran out of her classroom, refusing to go on her camp."

Kate hugs you. "You're going to be such a cute baby."

The rest of the girls, along with Mrs Collins, arrive soon after. There are 12 girls with suitcases and 5 without. The girls without suitcases seem almost as unhappy about being here as you. All except for one. Louise seems to be barely able to hide her excitement.

"What's wrong with Louise?" you ask Kate.

"She's just excited about the camp." she says. "She's been looking forward to it all year."

"But she doesn't have a suitcase." you point out. "Doesn't that mean she's one of the babies?"

"Yep." Tanya says. "She actually got the top mark in the class but insisted on being one of the babies. Louise is the only genuine volunteer."

"Why?" you ask. "She actually wants to pretend to be a baby?"

"She does it all the time with Ellen and Felicity." Kate points out. "But on the camp she get's to do it for real."

"What do you mean for real?" you ask.

"The babies all wear diapers on the camp." Kate informs you.

"I have to wear diapers?" you ask.

"And use them." Tanya adds.

"What?" you ask. "There's no way I'm going to do that."

Mrs Collins starts to get everyone organised. "Now everyone's here you can sort yourselves into families. Two parents and one baby per group."

Louise quickly takes hold of Ellen and Felicity's hands, claiming them as her parents.
122221.title: Tell her that you'll go on her camp if she ...

choices: Ask Kate what she would prefer
1222211.content:
There's no backing out now. You stay next to Kate and Tanya and the rest of the girls form their groups. Danielle chooses Helen and Jane as her parents, Sarah claims Jessica and Fiona and Judy joins Ashleigh and Deborah. That leaves Rachel and Kelly for Samantha.

"These bags have everything you'll need to take care of your babies." Mrs Collins indicates 6 large bags arranged in a neat row. "Get your babies diapered and dressed and we can get started."

Kate goes to retrieve a bag and Tanya begins undressing you. By the time you are completely naked, Kate has returned and spread a plastic mat on the floor.

"Lay down on the mat." she can't help giggling a little at your nudity.

You obey and she begins sprinkling baby powder over your privates and rubbing it into your bottom. Then she unfolds a large disposable diaper and tells you "lift your bottom." before sliding it under you and fastening the tapes.

"All done." she declares, helping you up. "Tanya can find you something to wear while I pack this up."

"I've got some bad news." Tanya says, looking through the bag. "These are all baby girl clothes." She holds up a pink dress. "I'll go ask Mrs Collins for some boy's clothes."

So you stand there, wearing only a diaper as the other babies get dressed in juvenile outfits.

"She says there aren't any boy's clothes." Tanya says when she returns. "She's never needed them."

"So what am I going to wear?" you ask.

"Mrs Collins said that if you want you can spend the camp in just your diapers." She says. "Or you can be a little girl like the rest of the babies."
1222211.title: Stay with Kate and Tanya

12222111.content:
"I don't know." you say. "What do you want me to do Kate?"

"I think you'll make an adorable little girl." Kate says.

"Then it's decided." Tanya says, picking up the pink dress again. "Arms up." she pulls it on over your head.

The girls slide matching shoes onto your feet then Mrs Collins announces. "Okay it looks like everyone is ready. Let's get on the bus."

You walk, with the group, out of the class room. The other "volunteers" are dress in equally juvenile outfits. Louise skips along happily, as if she was actually a little girl. The rest of you look nervously around afraid that someone might see you.

Fortunately everyone else is in class and it is a short walk to the bus.

On board, you find another surprise waiting for you. The bus has been fitted with 6 giant baby-seats. Miss Collins is, apparently, very thorough.

"Strap your babies into their seats." She directs.

Kate and Tanya lead you to one of them and you sit down. They clip you in and take their own seats in front of you.

The driver starts the bus and pulls out onto the road.

"Okay time to go over the rules." Mrs Collins says. standing at the front of the bus. "First, until we get back, the toilet is strictly off-limits for the babies. You will use your diapers. Second, babies may not dress themselves or change their own diapers, they must depend on their parents for that. And third, parents are responsible for the behavior of their babies. If they do something wrong it is up to you to punish them."

As the drive continues you grow bored. You've got nothing to do, strapped into this chair.
12222111.title: Ask Kate what she would prefer

12222112.content:
"Let me talk to her." you say then make your way across the room, wearing only your diaper.

"What's wrong Stephen?" Mrs Collins asks.

"I need some boy's clothes." you say.

"We don't have any." she informs you. "Why don't you just be a little girl like the other babies?"

"Because I'm not a girl." you say. "Can't I just wear my own clothes?"

"Okay." she agrees. "But only to and from the camp. You only have one set of clothes, you can't wear them all weekend."

Taking this small victory, you return to Kate and Tanya. "She said I can wear my own clothes to the camp."

"Aww." Tanya complains "You're no fun." but she helps you back into your school uniform.

Mrs Collins announces. "Okay it looks like everyone is ready. Let's get on the bus."

You walk, with the group, out of the class room. The other "volunteers" are dressed juvenile outfits. They look at you, obviously unhappy that you got to keep your big-kid clothes. Except for Louise that is. She skips along happily, as if she was actually a little girl.

On board, you find a surprise waiting for you. The bus has been fitted with 6 giant baby-seats. Miss Collins is, apparently, very thorough.

"Strap your babies into their seats." She directs.

Kate and Tanya lead you to one of them and you sit down. They clip you in and take their own seats in front of you.

The driver starts the bus and pulls out onto the road.

"Okay time to go over the rules." Mrs Collins says. standing at the front of the bus. "First, until we get back, the toilet is strictly off-limits for the babies. You will use your diapers. Second, babies may not dress themselves or change their own diapers, they must depend on their parents for that. And third, parents are responsible for the behavior of their babies. If they do something wrong it is up to you to punish them."

As the drive continues you grow bored. You've got nothing to do, strapped into this chair.
12222112.title: Talk to Mrs Collins yourself

1222212.content:
There's no way you're going to wear, and worse use, diapers. You turn and run out of the Child Care room.

"Wait." Kate calls as you get through the door. "Where are you going?"

Honestly, you don't know but you keep running.
1222212.title: Run away

12222121.content: You don't want to get into trouble for leaving the school grounds but where will you go. You'd normally have Science this period but your teacher isn't expecting you to be there.
12222121.title: Stay in the school

12222122.content:
You just want to get away from here. Ignoring the likely consequences, you turn and run out of the school grounds. When you are out of sight of the school you stop and catch your breath.

What are you going to do now? Your mother will be at home and you aren't sure you could explain yourself when she asks why you're not on the camp.
12222122.title: Leave the school

choices: Agree to go on the camp
Refuse to go to the camp
122222.content:
"No." you try to explain again. "I wasn't changing my grade. I'd heard that someone...."

"That's enough." she says. "You can go but I'm calling your parents."

You leave the classroom and spend the remainder of the school day worrying about what your parents will do when you get home.

"Your Home Economics teacher called today." is the first thing your mother says when you see her. "She said that you are failing her class and she caught you trying to change your marks."

"But..." you start to argue but she cuts you off.

"She said that she is considering having you suspended." She continues. "But she also said that she'd let you off with a warning give you a pass in Home Economics if you volunteer to go on her camp."

"Did she tell you what happens on her camp?" you ask.

"Yes." your mother says. "You wear diapers and act like a baby so that the girls can practice taking care of you."

"Wear diapers?" you ask. So that's why the girl dropped out.

"And use them." she says. "The girls need practice changing diapers too."

"Well there's no way I'm going on that camp then." you say.

"If you get suspended then you can spend that time in diapers instead." she threatens.
122222.title: Insist that you were just trying to find out wh...

choices: Let the girls put you in a dress
Change your mind about the camp
1222221.content:
"Fine." you agree, defeated. "I'll go on the camp."

Friday morning arrives too soon. Your mother rushes you out the door. "Wait." you say. "Don't I need to pack a suitcase?"

"No." your mother explains. "Mrs Collins said that she provides everything the babies need."

When you arrive at the Child Care room there are already three few girls waiting. Helen, Tanya and Jane. They all have suitcases with them so you deduce that they must not be volunteers.

"The first baby is here." Helen announces.

"Daniel." Tanya says. "Kate was hoping you'd come. You'll be our baby right?"

"Um..." you say. "I guess."

Kate enters moments later. "Daniel! You're coming on the camp?"

"Yep." Tanya says. "And he wants to be our baby."

Kate hugs you. "You're going to be such a cute baby."

The rest of the girls, along with Mrs Collins, arrive soon after. There are 12 girls with suitcases and 5 without. The girls without suitcases seem almost as unhappy about being here as you. All except for one. Louise seems to be barely able to hide her excitement.

"What's wrong with Louise?" you ask Kate.

"She's just excited about the camp." she says. "She's been looking forward to it all year."

"But she doesn't have a suitcase." you point out. "Doesn't that mean she's one of the babies?"

"Yep." Tanya says. "She actually got the top mark in the class but insisted on being one of the babies. Louise is the only genuine volunteer."

"Why?" you ask. "She actually wants to wear diapers?"

"She plays baby with Ellen and Felicity all the time." Kate points out. "But on the camp she get's to do it for real."

Mrs Collins starts to get everyone organised. "Now everyone's here you can sort yourselves into families. Two parents and one baby per group."

Louise quickly takes hold of Ellen and Felicity's hands, claiming them as her parents. You stay next to Kate and Tanya and the rest of the girls form their groups. Danielle chooses Helen and Jane as her parents, Sarah claims Jessica and Fiona and Judy joins Ashleigh and Deborah. That leaves Rachel and Kelly for Samantha.

"These bags have everything you'll need to take care of your babies." Mrs Collins indicates 6 large bags arranged in a neat row. "Get your babies diapered and dressed and we can get started."

Kate goes to retrieve a bag and Tanya begins undressing you. By the time you are completely naked, Kate has returned and spread a plastic mat on the floor.

"Lay down on the mat." she can't help giggling a little at your nudity.

You obey and she begins sprinkling baby powder over your privates and rubbing it into your bottom. Then she unfolds a large disposable diaper and tells you "lift your bottom." before sliding it under you and fastening the tapes.

"All done." she declares, helping you up. "Tanya can find you something to wear while I pack this up."

"I've got some bad news." Tanya says, looking through the bag. "These are all baby girl clothes." She holds up a pink dress. "I'll go ask Mrs Collins for some boy's clothes."

So you stand there, wearing only a diaper as the other babies get dressed in juvenile outfits.

Tanya returns with Mrs Collins.

"We've never needed boy's clothes." The teacher explains.

"So what am I going to wear?" you ask.

"You can be a little girl like the rest of the babies." She tells you.
1222221.title: Agree to go on the camp

12222211.content:
"Fine." you reluctantly agree. "I'm already diapered. This might as well be completely humiliating."

"That's the spirit." Kate says.

"Arms up." Tanya directs you and pulls the pink dress down over your head.

Kate finds a pair of flat blue buckle-up shoes to match your dress and slides them on to your feet just as Mrs Collins announces. "Okay it looks like everyone is ready. Let's get on the bus."

You walk, with the group, out of the class room. The other "volunteers" are dress in equally juvenile outfits. Louise skips along happily, as if she was actually a little girl. The rest of you look nervously around afraid that someone might see you.

Fortunately everyone else is in class and it is a short walk to the bus.

On board, you find another surprise waiting for you. The bus has been fitted with 6 giant baby-seats. Miss Collins is, apparently, very thorough.

"Strap your babies into their seats." She directs.

Kate and Tanya lead you to one of them and you sit down. They clip you in and take their own seats in front of you.

The driver starts the bus and pulls out onto the road.

"Okay time to go over the rules." Mrs Collins says. standing at the front of the bus. "First, until we get back, the toilet is strictly off-limits for the babies. You will use your diapers. Second, babies may not dress themselves or change their own diapers, they must depend on their parents for that. And third, parents are responsible for the behavior of their babies. If they do something wrong it is up to you to punish them."

You stare out the window, waiting for this to be over and hoping that it doesn't get any worse.

About an hour into the drive, it does get worse. You begin to feel the need to pee. As time goes on it becomes more urgent.
12222211.title: Let the girls put you in a dress

choices: Take the diaper off and get dressed
12222212.content:
"No." you say. "This is too much I'm not going to spend the weekend as a baby girl."

"But Stephen." Kate pleads. "We need a baby."

"I can't do this." you state again.

"Come with me." she says, taking you by the hand to her office. "I'll call your mother to pick you up."

"Wait." you say, as you are pulled along wearing nothing but a diaper.

She ignores your complaints and keeps pulling you away from your clothes which are still laying next to the changing mat.

She calls your mother. "I'm afraid that Stephen has changed his mind about the camp... Yes he will have to be suspended... I know. Two of the girls will miss out of a baby. They are very dissapointed... Really? That's very kind of you... I'm sure they will be pleased. Thank you. Goodbye."

"Your coming to get you." Mrs Collins says. "Don't bother taking your diaper off. Your mother has offered to let Kate and Tanya take care of you at home."

"What?" you ask.

"She said that you'll be in diapers for the length of your suspension." Mrs Collins explains. "And that she would appreciate help from the girls."

Mrs Collins explains the new arrangements to Kate and Tanya, who seem happy with it.
12222212.title: Change your mind about the camp

1222222.content:
"I'm not going to that camp." you say, hoping that your past record is enough to keep you from being suspended.

Your hope lasts until the next morning when you are called into the principal's office. You find your mother already there.

"Two weeks?" you ask, shocked when you are informed of your punishment. "You're suspending me for 2 weeks?"

"Attempting to change your grades is a serious matter." The principal, Mr Thompson, tells you.

"But I wasn't..." You try once again to argue your case.

"That's enough." He stops you. "Your suspension starts immediately."

Your mother apologises for your behavior then leads you out to her car. She doesn't say a word to you as she drives.

As you look out your window you realise that she's not taking you home. You want to ask but are afraid to break the tense silence. You get your answer soon anyway as she parks in front of a store. The sign above the door reads "Bed-wetting and incontinence supplies" She's taking her thread seriously.

She gets out of the car. "Are you coming in?"
1222222.title: Refuse to go to the camp

choices: Beg your mother not to do this to you
12222221.content:
You don't want to upset her further so you get out of the car and follow your mother into the store.

Your heart sinks when you get inside. There are shelves full of every type of diaper. You blush as you imagine yourself wearing each, knowing that at least one of those images is in your near future.

"Can I help you?" a saleswoman approaches your mother.

"Yes." your mother says simply. "I need some diapers for my son." She motions toward you.

You fight the urge to leap behind a shelf and hide as the woman looks you up and down, judging your size.

"Does he have a bed-wetting problem?" she asks.

"No." your mother says. "He was suspended from school today. I warned him if he gets suspended then he will be wearing diapers for the duration."

The young woman barely stifles a giggle. "Were you looking for disposable diapers or the washable terry kind?"

"I hadn't really considered." your mother admits. "What do you recommend?"

"Well if you're trying to make him really embarrassed I'd go with the terry. They are bulkier and he won't be able to hide them under clothes." she says. "Are you planning on making him use his diapers?"

"Yes." your mother says. "Of course."

"Well the disposables would be much more convenient. If he's in terry nappies and you're out of the house you'll probably have to let him stay in a wet or messy diaper until you get home." she says. "The disposables you can change anywhere."

"Thank you." your mother says. "Could you give us a moment please?"

"Of course." the sales woman returns to the counter.

"I'll let you choose the diapers you want." your mother tells you. "If you ask nicely. Otherwise I'll choose."

The disposables sound like the lesser of the two evils but can you really bring yourself to ask for them.
12222221.title: Follow her into the store

choices: Don't do as you are told
12222222.content:
"No way." you say, staying in your seat.

"Suit yourself." she says and goes into the store alone.

About 15 minutes later she returns, carrying some very large bags. She places them in the back of the car and drives home without saying word.

"Go to your room and get undressed." she breaks the silence as you get out of the car. "I will be in to diaper you in a minute."
12222222.title: Stay in the car

info.brief_description: To avoid failing Home Economics you volunteer to help out the Child Care class - as a baby
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You are a straight-A student. Except for Home Economics. You only took it because you thought it would be an easy class and would allow you to focus more on your other subjects. You're failing and will have to repeat the year unless you earn some extra credit.

Your teacher offers you an opportunity to do that. She also has a Child Care class and every year she takes the girls in that class on a camp so they can practice taking care of babies full-time. The girls who don't perform in class "volunteer" to play the babies but this year she is one volunteer short.
